title: Depression Strategies: Practical Tools for Professionals Treating Depression
description: This book is designed as a resource for the clinician versed in identifying and treating depression. Hopefully, it will be a source of inspiration to busy clinicians and serve as a time-saver by providing strategies and exercises for use with clients experiencing depression. This workbook is composed of six Depression â€“ An Overview Depression History Strategies Cognitive Strategies Affective Strategies Behavioral Strategies Conceptive Spiritual Strategies In each of the strategies sections, ideas are given for structured interventions derived from the use of more than 50 handouts. These reproducible handouts and a compact disc, Imageries, are included in this workbook. The disc contains four Relaxation Exercise, Inner Child Affirmation, Inner Source of Wisdom and Letting Go and Receiving.
author: Claudia Black
